name: 陳偉堯
objective: 這是大學部學生的第二門程式語言課程，將銜接基礎的Fortran程式設計，並準備學生進入FIT-2。本課程將以C/C++教授變數、運算式、流程圖、擬程式碼、控制敘述、判斷敘述、分支敘述、迴圈、指標、字串、檔案讀寫、函數、陣列、物件、類別、向量等課題，並視情況教授資料抽象化、控制元超載、繼承、及變形等進階題材。(學校規定之專業必修課程)
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction and history
Week 2: First C++ program and code::blocks IDE
Week 3: program structure and pre-processor
Week 4: constants and variables
Week 5: numbers and strings
Week 6: arithmetic and logical operators
Week 7: intrinsic functions
Week 8: if structure (case)
Week 9: midterm exam
Week 10: loops (while and for)
Week 11: input and output 
Week 12: File processing
Week 13: I/O streams and data files
Week 14: arrays and pointer
Week 15: functions
Week 16: classes and objects
Week 17: inheritance
Week 18: final exam
scorePolicy: 平時成績40%、期中考30%、期末考30%
materials: Bronson, G. J. (2013). C++ for Engineers and Scientists, 4th Edition, Course Technology, International Student Edition, 828 pages 滄海圖書
